Race.SummaryText:
PARISHWIDE SCHOOL BOARD PROPOSITION 
(SALES TAX RENEWAL)

SUMMARY:  RENEWAL OF A 1% SALES AND USE TAX OF THE PARISH SCHOOL BOARD WITH THE PROCEEDS OF THE TAX TO BE USED TO ACQUIRE, CONSTRUCT, IMPROVE, MAINTAIN AND OPERATE THE PUBLIC ELEMENTARY AND SECONDARY SCHOOLS WITHIN THE PARISH AND FOR ANY OTHER LAWFUL CORPORATE PURPOSE OF THE SCHOOL BOARD, INCLUDING PAYMENT OF SALARIES AND BENEFITS OF SCHOOL PERSONNEL.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish School Board of the Parish of West Feliciana, State of Louisiana, under the provisions of Article VI, Section 29 of the Constitution of the State of Louisiana of 1974, and other constitutional and statutory authority supplemental thereto, be authorized to continue to levy and collect a tax of one percent (1%) (the "Tax") upon the sale at retail, the use, the lease or rental, the consumption and the storage for use or consumption, of tangible personal property and on sales of services in the Parish of West Feliciana, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), all as defined by law (an estimated $2,000,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), from and after January 1, 2010 with the avails or proceeds of said Tax to be used to acquire, construct, improve, maintain and operate the public elementary and secondary schools within the Parish and for any other lawful corporate purpose of said School Board, including payment of salaries and benefits of school personnel?

Race.SummaryText:
PARISHWIDE PROPOSITION
(CONSOLIDATED SCHOOL DISTRICT NO. 1)
(PROPERTY TAX RENEWAL)

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR 14.75 MILL PROPERTY TAX RENEWAL OF CONSOLIDATED SCHOOL DISTRICT NO. 1 FOR GIVING ADDITIONAL SUPPORT TO THE PUBLIC ELEMENTARY AND SECONDARY SCHOOLS WITHIN CONSOLIDATED SCHOOL DISTRICT NO. 1 AND FOR ANY OTHER LAWFUL CORPORATE PURPOSE OF THE DISTRICT, INCLUDING ACQUIRING, CONSTRUCTING, IMPROVING, MAINTAINING AND OPERATING THE PUBLIC ELEMENTARY AND SECONDARY SCHOOLS WITHIN THE DISTRICT AND PAYING SALARIES AND BENEFITS OF SCHOOL BOARD PERSONNEL.
Race.FullText: Shall Consolidated School District No. 1 of the Parish of West Feliciana, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of fourteen and seventy-five hundredths (14.75) mills on all the property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $3,982,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2009 and ending with the year 2018, for the purpose of giving additional support to the public elementary and secondary schools within the District and for any other lawful corporate purpose of the District, including acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and operating the public elementary and secondary schools within the District and paying salaries and benefits of school board personnel?
